explanations.e1: 1. Go to controllers menu on Switch.
explanations.e4: 4. Go to JoyCon menu on this App and Press Sync Button.
explanations.e5: 5. Allow your phone to be discovered by other devices.
explanations.e6:
6. Wait for Switch to initiate connection
Be patient but you might need to try this couple of times.
explanations.e7:
7. Once Switch asked for pairing
wait till JoyCon icon is displayed as below.
explanations.e8: 8. Press SL and SR buttons couple of times.
explanations.e9:
9. Once JoyCon icon turns solid gray
press down button and exit discovery
explanations.e10:
10. Now JoyCon should be operational
If it disconnects at any point repeat these steps.

legalAndDisclaimer.ai1: JoyCon Droid emulates Right Joy-Con, Left Joy-Con and Pro Controller.
legalAndDisclaimer.ai2: Please check the User Guide for more information.
legalAndDisclaimer.ai3: This application is in alpha stage and does not work with some phones.
